price: o kúkú ti mú àlá náà ṣẹ. Dájúdájú báyẹn ni Àwa ṣe ń san àwọn olùṣe-rere ní ẹ̀san (rere).
arabic: قَدۡ صَدَّقۡتَ ٱلرُّءۡيَآۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qad ṣaddaqta al-ru'yā innā kadhālika najzī al-muḥ'sinīna
